Name: Average time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Checklist Completed after the execution of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants that include reviewer assignment delays
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Elapsed time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and Manuscript Export Succeeded in cases where plagiarism thresholds were exceeded
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Checklist Completed following Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed in cases that eventually reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants involving multiple reviewer declines or reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and the first occurrence of any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-AE Assign Reviewers after the execution of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed in high-complexity variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Cycle Time of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed measured from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to its completion
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Total resolution time of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed in submissions leading to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'total'}"

Name: Time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW–Major Revision due in 1 month in multi-round revision cases
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'", 'end': "activity == 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 month'", 'aggregation': 'average'}"
